channel.title: Project "Secret Village"
channel.description:
[center][size=15pt]Welcome to [color=blue][size=17pt]"The Secret Village"[/size][/color] Development Team's Offical Topic[/size][/center]
[center][size=13pt]Server Completition Process: ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| (10% Done)[/size][/center]
[size=9pt][i]This server is going to be huge; I have spend hours on hours developing concepts and ways that this server will be run and programmed. Now I need some help, I am creating a development team to help me with designing/programming the client and server, and testing the server for bugs, and lastly creating and adminstering the forums. I am looking for the following type people for my staff:[/i]
[hr]
[i][b]Upcoming Announcements:[/b] Saved for future use.
[center][b]Head Developers:[/b]Rich Dude99, OPEN [/center]
[u][b][Coders][/b][/u] [b]MYSQL Coder(s):[/b] OPEN [size=7pt][i]*Will work specificly with the forum administration team to create MYSQL.*[/i][/size] [b]All Around Coder(s):[/b] OPEN, OPEN, jc22493 [size=7pt][i]Coders:The way the team works is that for coders, once we start the project I will bring in the necessary coders to finish a step of the process, then I will call in the other coders to their assigned job, etc. Mainly once that coder is accepted I will contact them with more information about the process we will begin with.[/i][/size]
[u][b]Offical Testers;[/b][/u] [b]Bug Testers:[/b] OPEN, OPEN [b]Client Testers (New Items, NPCS, etc.):[/b] OPEN OPEN [b]Skill Testers:[/b] OPEN OPEN [b]All Around Testers:[/b] OPEN, OPEN, OPEN [size=7pt][i]Testers: Testers will not be contacted untill the server is compeletly finished. The Testers are the "Offical Ones", because I will call in some people just to try it out, but the offical testers get the final call on the release date.[/i][/size]
[u][b]Forum/Website Staff;[/b][/u] [b]Overall Forum Manager:[/b] Rich Dude99 [b]MYSQL Intergrator:[/b] OPEN, OPEN [b]Forum Administration:[/b] Djayboi6,OPEN [b]Moderator(s):[/b] OPEN, OPEN [size=7pt][i]Forum/Website Staff: will start as soon as the coders start, they will work hard to create the forums, and the forum testers and moderators will not be called until the forum is finished! Please make note that the Forum/Website creators must have experience or be willing to work with MySQL sevrer intergration.[/i][/size]
[u][b]Client Staff;[/b][/u] [b]Overall Client Manager:[/b] OPEN [b]508+ Server Intergration Coder(s):[/b] OPEN, OPEN [b]New Object/Item Coder(s):[/b] OPEN, OPEN [b]New NPC Coder(s):[/b] OPEN, OPEN
[u][b]Application Formats;[/b][/u] *Required
[b]Coders;[/b] [code][b]Forum Name (Moparscape)*:[/b] [b]Desired In-Game/Forum Name (Secret Village)*:[/b] [b]Applying for what kind of coder*:[/b] [b]Experience (Show Proof)*:[/b] [b]Why did you decide to apply for this*:[/b] [b]Anything else:[/b] [b]Best form of contact*:[/b] [b]Whats your Email:[/b] [b]Whats your MSN Messenger:[/b] [b]Have you added: erbeeler@gmail.com (my msn)*:[/b][/code]
[b]Offical Testers[/b] [code][b]Forum Name (Moparscape)*:[/b] [b]Desired In-Game/Forum Name (Secret Village)*:[/b] [b]Applying for what kind of tester*:[/b] [b]Experience:[/b] [b]Why did you decide to apply for this*:[/b] [b]Anything else:[/b] [b]Best form of contact*:[/b] [b]Whats your Email:[/b] [b]Whats your MSN Messenger:[/b] [b]Have you added: erbeeler@gmail.com (my msn)*:[/b][/code]
[b]Forum Maker[/b] [code][b]Forum Name (Moparscape)*:[/b] [b]Desired In-Game/Forum Name (Secret Village)*:[/b] [b]Applying for what kind of forum staff*:[/b] [b]Experience*:[/b] [b]Why did you decide to apply for this*:[/b] [b]Anything else:[/b] [b]Best form of contact*:[/b] [b]Whats your Email:[/b] [b]Whats your MSN Messenger:[/b] [b]Have you added: erbeeler@gmail.com (my msn)*:[/b][/code]
[b]Client Coders;[/b] [code][b]Forum Name (Moparscape)*:[/b] [b]Desired In-Game/Forum Name (Secret Village)*:[/b] [b]Applying for what kind of coder*:[/b] [b]Experience (Show Proof)*:[/b] [b]Why did you decide to apply for this*:[/b] [b]Anything else:[/b] [b]Best form of contact*:[/b] [b]Whats your Email:[/b] [b]Whats your MSN Messenger:[/b] [b]Have you added: erbeeler@gmail.com (my msn)*:[/b][/code]
[b]Permission Given to Form Development Group:[/b]
[quote="sppt"]I don't see a problem with it, but I rarely go to moparscape, so it'd be best to ask a moparscape mod as well[/quote]
[quote="m.dog311"]I'm going to approve this one. But I will be watching the thread.[/quote]

item.title: Project "Secret Village"
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

Ok, If this is a 317 I would be glad to join. Most of the people on here only like 317 because they have problems/issues trying to get on a 508. 317 is more easier, but however, it is ur decision. Maybe even make 2 of the same server, a 317, 508. I’ll leave you to decide.
Forum Name (Moparscape): Bonzakid
Desired In-Game/Forum Name (Secret Village): Bonzakid
Applying for what kind of tester: All around Tester
Experience: I have coded my own servers, about 4 of them back in the day. And I am currently doing a project as we speak. I would like to see what you can come up with! Haha.
Why did you decide to apply for this: Because I want to be a Tester
Anything else: I’m the best
Best form of contact: Msn
Whats your Email: j.a.m.e.z@live.com
Whats your MSN Messenger: Just told you
Have you added: erbeeler@gmail.com (my msn): Sure Haven’t yet!

Read full topic

I might apply but i’ve never seen you before.

item.title: Project "Secret Village"
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

The base is not 100% determined due to the following factors:

[ul][li]I am not sure if this server is going to be made 317, 508, or what generation. (Most likely 508)[/li]
[li]I need to discuss the coding capabilities of my coding staff, what they would like.[/li]
[li]I need to a good base, and I havent seen a 100% appealing one yet.[/li][/ul]

Hope you consider joining my development team,
Rich Dude99

Read full topic

item.title: Project "Secret Village"
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

[center][size=15pt]Welcome to [color=blue][size=17pt]“The Secret Village”[/size][/color] Development Team’s Offical Topic[/size][/center]

[center][size=13pt]Server Completition Process: ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| (10% Done)[/size][/center]

[size=9pt]This server is going to be huge; I have spend hours on hours developing concepts and ways that this server will be run and programmed. Now I need some help, I am creating a development team to help me with designing/programming the client and server, and testing the server for bugs, and lastly creating and adminstering the forums. I am looking for the following type people for my staff:

[hr]

[i]Upcoming Announcements: Saved for future use.

[center]Head Developers:Rich Dude99, OPEN [/center]

[Coders]
MYSQL Coder(s): OPEN
[size=7pt]Will work specificly with the forum administration team to create MYSQL.[/size]
All Around Coder(s): OPEN, OPEN, jc22493
[size=7pt]Coders:The way the team works is that for coders, once we start the project I will bring in the necessary coders to finish a step of the process, then I will call in the other coders to their assigned job, etc. Mainly once that coder is accepted I will contact them with more information about the process we will begin with.[/size]

Offical Testers;
Bug Testers: OPEN, OPEN
Client Testers (New Items, NPCS, etc.): OPEN OPEN
Skill Testers: OPEN OPEN
All Around Testers: OPEN, OPEN, OPEN
[size=7pt]Testers: Testers will not be contacted untill the server is compeletly finished. The Testers are the “Offical Ones”, because I will call in some people just to try it out, but the offical testers get the final call on the release date.[/size]

Forum/Website Staff;
Overall Forum Manager: Rich Dude99
MYSQL Intergrator: OPEN, OPEN
Forum Administration: Djayboi6,OPEN
Moderator(s): OPEN, OPEN
[size=7pt]Forum/Website Staff: will start as soon as the coders start, they will work hard to create the forums, and the forum testers and moderators will not be called until the forum is finished! Please make note that the Forum/Website creators must have experience or be willing to work with MySQL sevrer intergration.[/size]

Client Staff;
Overall Client Manager: OPEN
508+ Server Intergration Coder(s): OPEN, OPEN
New Object/Item Coder(s): OPEN, OPEN
New NPC Coder(s): OPEN, OPEN

Application Formats;
*Required

Coders;

[b]Forum Name (Moparscape)*:[/b] [b]Desired In-Game/Forum Name (Secret Village)*:[/b] [b]Applying for what kind of coder*:[/b] [b]Experience (Show Proof)*:[/b] [b]Why did you decide to apply for this*:[/b] [b]Anything else:[/b] [b]Best form of contact*:[/b] [b]Whats your Email:[/b] [b]Whats your MSN Messenger:[/b] [b]Have you added: erbeeler@gmail.com (my msn)*:[/b]

Offical Testers

[b]Forum Name (Moparscape)*:[/b] [b]Desired In-Game/Forum Name (Secret Village)*:[/b] [b]Applying for what kind of tester*:[/b] [b]Experience:[/b] [b]Why did you decide to apply for this*:[/b] [b]Anything else:[/b] [b]Best form of contact*:[/b] [b]Whats your Email:[/b] [b]Whats your MSN Messenger:[/b] [b]Have you added: erbeeler@gmail.com (my msn)*:[/b]

Forum Maker

[b]Forum Name (Moparscape)*:[/b] [b]Desired In-Game/Forum Name (Secret Village)*:[/b] [b]Applying for what kind of forum staff*:[/b] [b]Experience*:[/b] [b]Why did you decide to apply for this*:[/b] [b]Anything else:[/b] [b]Best form of contact*:[/b] [b]Whats your Email:[/b] [b]Whats your MSN Messenger:[/b] [b]Have you added: erbeeler@gmail.com (my msn)*:[/b]

Client Coders;

[b]Forum Name (Moparscape)*:[/b] [b]Desired In-Game/Forum Name (Secret Village)*:[/b] [b]Applying for what kind of coder*:[/b] [b]Experience (Show Proof)*:[/b] [b]Why did you decide to apply for this*:[/b] [b]Anything else:[/b] [b]Best form of contact*:[/b] [b]Whats your Email:[/b] [b]Whats your MSN Messenger:[/b] [b]Have you added: erbeeler@gmail.com (my msn)*:[/b]

Permission Given to Form Development Group:

sppt:

I don’t see a problem with it, but I rarely go to moparscape, so it’d be best to ask a moparscape mod as well
